titles: The plaintiffs case upon an appeal brought in the House of Lords against
author: Noy, William, Captain.
Fortescue, Peter, Sir, 1620 or 21-1685.
notes: To left of title: Capt. William Noy Executor of Honour Noy Plaint, i one bill, Humphrey Sarah Honour Prudence children and administrators of Francis Noy in the other bill are plaintiffs. To right of title: Sir Peter Fortescu Baronet, and Dame Amy his wife, relict, and executrix of Sir Peter Courtny, defendants.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Trusts and trustees --  Cases --  Early works to 1800.
